input.sentences: the neighbors had just moved into their new house .

i 'm excited to meet them | maybe i will introduce myself by knocking on the front door .
output.sentences: I wanted to meet the neighbors because i just moved to the house next door.
As i observed their yard, they had a small tree that look nice and well taken cared of.
I looked across the street, the neighbors across had some trimmed and nicely kept brushes.
As i walked down street i could see one parked car on the side.
I finallay arrived to the neighbors to meet them and as i was knocking they opened the door so i introduce myself.
